resources.string: * After pressing the button put your phone in your pants pocket. The app will start collecting the data 5 seconds after pressing the button. The data collection will take 60 seconds and you will be informed when it\'s done since the phone will vibrate.
Input your PIN to unlock the data.
Wrong authentication values. Please try again.
Because you are using the app for the first time you have to add your gait (walking sample) for later unlocking of the application.
You are about to exit the application. Are you sure?
